short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Significantly increases the quality of Riemurasia experience for unregistered users.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
- Allows users to view Riemurasia.net comments in plain language without logging in.
- Removes all microtransaction related elements
- Removes campaign ads
- Removes the huge logo div when ads are not present
